titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Athletics, Yale University, Records Documenting Lacrosse
Department of Athletics, Yale University, Records Documenting Lacrosse
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:33

did.unittitle: Department of Athletics, Yale University, records documenting lacrosse

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, newsletters, manager's files, financial records, and scrapbooks, maintained by the Yale Department of Athletics, documenting men's and women's lacrosse at Yale.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 38-B (YRG 38-B), Records documenting specific sports at Yale.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: Lacrosse scrapbooks are available on microfilm from Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library, at cost. Order no. HM193. 1985. 837 frames on 1 reel, 35mm.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Department of Athletics, Yale University, 2005.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Athletics, Yale University, Records Documenting Lacrosse (RU 939), Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, newsletters, manager's files, financial records, and scrapbooks, maintained by the Yale Department of Athletics, documenting men's and women's lacrosse at Yale.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Scrapbooks are available on microfilm. Patrons must use HM FILM 193 instead of the originals.

did.unittitle: Manager's files of the lacrosse team

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

did.unittitle: Records of the men's and women's lacrosse teams
